obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_19_: * Ho ho ho^1!&* Somehow^1, you survived the maze!/
obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_20_: \E1* But don't count your blessings before they hatch...!/
obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_21_: \E2* Let's see how you fare against THIS team!/%
obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_79_: * Hey, why aren't you guys thrashed?! You're totally outnumbered!/
obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_81_: * You made a team purely of SUPPORT ENEMIES./
obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_82_: * Their bullet patterns aren't balanced at all./
obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_83_: \E1* It's like a dinner made out of three glasses of milk./
obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_88_: * Why don't we talk about this AFTER the battle?/%
obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_116: * Great job, Kris!&* We earned ~1 EXP&and ~2 D$!/%
obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_136: * Sweet!&* How much do I get?/
obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_138: * You..^1. lost^1, Lancer^1.&* You don't get any./
obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_141: \E3* Can I have some of yours?/
obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_181: * K... Kris^1?&* You're giving it to me...?/
obj_hathyfightevent_slash_Step_0_gml_192: * HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO KNOW!^1? LEAVE ME ALONE!!!/%
